name: Dan Vinci's Ghost Hunt (School Project)
description:
The brother of Da Vinci is going on a  special hunt. And uses the glider his brother made to take down some hostile ghosts near the ports of Spain. Fight the Flying Dutchmen to release the curse of the Spanish seaports.

-------

This game was made in 3 weeks by:

Art:
Kayla Roeten 
Damian Schippers

Developers:
Johmi Kamerling
Kellin Schaap

--------

Credit to https://www.FesliyanStudios.com for the background music.
